typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_Id} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> srcComments
srcComments sink(input(
		CommentId as long,
		CommentSk as long,
		CreationDate as string,
		PostId as long,
		Score as long,
		Text as string,
		UserDisplayName as string,
		UserId as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		CommentSk = {_Id},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		PostId = {_PostId},
		Score = {_Score},
		Text = {_Text},
		UserDisplayName = {_UserDisplayName},
		UserId = {_UserId}
	)) ~> dstComment
